SELECT pt.id AS id, pt.context AS context, ppm.state AS state, ps.vendor_name AS vendor_name, pt.create_time AS create_time, pp.request_user_name AS request_user_name FROM pcms_transfer pt LEFT JOIN pcms_pending_material ppm ON pt.pending_id = ppm.id LEFT JOIN pcms_item pit ON ppm.itid = pit.itid LEFT JOIN pcms_supplier ps ON pit.vendor_id = ps.vendor_id LEFT JOIN pcms_project pp ON pp.REQUEST_ID = pit.request_id
AND ps.vendor_name LIKE '%${params.vendor_name}%'
OR pp.request_user_name LIKE '%${params.request_user_name}%'
AND pt.person_name = #{params.person_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and ppm.state != 0
